tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE daily_calorie_intake (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    total_calories INT,
    protein_grams DECIMAL,
    carbs_grams DECIMAL,
    fat_grams DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE FoodConsumption (
   date DATE,
   food_name VARCHAR(255),
   calories INT,
   protein_g INT,
   carbs_g INT,
   fats_g INT,
   PRIMARY KEY (date, food_name)
);

CREATE TABLE daily_calorie_intake (
    date DATE,
    total_calories INT,
    protein_grams INT,
    carbs_grams INT,
    fat_grams INT
);

CREATE TABLE food_diary (
    entry_id SERIAL,
    date DATE,
    food_name TEXT,
    calories INT,
    protein_grams INT,
    carbs_grams INT,
    fat_grams INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id SERIAL,
    username TEXT,
    age INT,
    weight FLOAT,
    height FLOAT,
    daily_calorie_goal INT,
    protein_goal INT,
    carbs_goal INT,
    fat_goal INT
);

CREATE TABLE meal_plan (
    plan_id SERIAL,
    user_id INT,
    plan_name TEXT,
    total_calories INT,
    total_protein INT,
    total_carbs INT,
    total_fat INT
);

CREATE TABLE Meals (
meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
meal_time TIMESTAMP,
meal_name VARCHAR,
calories INT,
protein INT,
carbs INT,
fat INT,
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Food (
food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
food_name VARCHAR UNIQUE,
calories INT,
protein INT,
carbs INT,
fat INT
);

CREATE TABLE Food_Log (
log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
food_id INT,
log_date DATE,
quantity INT,
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(id),
FOREIGN KEY (food_id) REFERENCES Food(food_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Daily_Report (
report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
report_date DATE,
calories_consumed INT,
protein_consumed INT,
carbs_consumed INT,
fat_consumed INT,
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(id)
);
